Text: Hey everybody, I didn't actually mean to put this in Other/Comics. I meant to put it in Other/Other with the rest of the issues I uploaded. But I'm noticing that the few I accidentally put in Other/Comics are getting way more downloads. So, if you click on my name up above it will lead you to 39 issues of this magazine released between June 2009 and October 2012. Enjoy.
Any chance of you putting multiple issues in a single torrent? Maybe by year? Thanks btw, you've been putting up some awesome stuff.

You're most welcome, whatmeworry. And thanks for the kind words.

Ya' know, I considered doing exactly that, torrents by year. But in the end I think doing it this way allows the most options for the most people. Trust me when I say its far more of a pain in the ass to upload them this way than it is to download them.
